subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Shockey and Plaxico Burress get most of the attention in the Giants’ passing game, but when quarterback Eli Manning needs help, it is Amani Toomer who gets the ball.
snippet: Jeremy Shockey and Plaxico Burress get most of the attention in the Giants’ passing game, but when quarterback Eli Manning needs help, it is Amani Toomer who gets the ball.
